DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , single treatment study . All subject receive one year oral contraceptive therapy DR-1011 . Study participant receive physical gynecological exam , include Pap smear . During study , participant require complete diary .
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Extended-cycle , Low Dose Combination Oral Contraceptive
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Not pregnant breastfeed Sexually active risk pregnancy Any contraindication use oral contraceptive Pregnancy within last 3 month Smoking > 10 cigarette per day
